text: Tamen wen ni yuejing de (lu li), ni shuo: Yuejing shi youhai de, gu zai jingqi zhong nimen yingdang likai qizi, buyao yu tamen jiaojie, zhidao tamen qingjie. Dang tamen xi jing de shihou, nimen keyi zai zhen zhu suo ming nimen de buwei yu tamen jiaojie. Zhen zhu dique xi'ai huizui de ren, dique xi'ai jiejing de ren.
